column4: I used to use compiz to draw my desktop wallpapers, I am using 10.10 64bit and it seems as though if I turn nautilus draw desktop off, nothing draws the desktop wallpaper. Does anybody know how to have a different wallpaper for each virtual desktop (in the compiz wall)?
i dont even want to thinko f the extra resources that'll eat ;)
then I had a script that would automatically change each desktop background every minute or so.
heh. I'll stick with my Icewm. Function over pretty ;)
